issues.title: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element
issues.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element

any.message: ARIA role presentation is not allowed for given element

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role presentation is not allowed for given element

issues.title: Uses ARIA roles on incompatible elements
issues.description: Many HTML elements can only be assigned certain ARIA roles. Using ARIA roles where they are not allowed can interfere with the accessibility of the web page. [Learn more about ARIA roles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/aria-allowed-role).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role presentation is not allowed for given element

issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.43 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #999999, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.43 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #999999, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.43:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #323232.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.43:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #323232.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > footer > div:nth-child(2) > a

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.43 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #999999, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.66:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #333333, surrounding text: #000000)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.66:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #333333, surrounding text: #000000)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.66:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #333333, surrounding text: #000000)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
